title: Compose Multiplatform Capstone Quiz
description: Test your understanding of the concepts used in the Task Manager capstone project.

questions.question: In Compose Multiplatform, where do you place shared UI code?
questions.explanation: Shared UI code goes in commonMain. Platform-specific code goes in androidMain, iosMain, etc.

questions.question: What pattern does the capstone use to separate UI from business logic?
questions.explanation: MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) separates concerns: ViewModel holds state and logic, View (Composables) renders UI.
